TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項必須實作的方法，以自動載入回傳資料。

span.span: Defines methods that ASP.NET server controls must implement to automatically load postback data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須實作介面建立的伺服器控制項，需要檢查用戶端回傳至伺服器的表單資料時。You must implement the interface when creating a server control that needs to examine form data that is posted back to the server by the client. 這個介面會定義合約可讓伺服器控制項，以判斷是否應該更改它的狀態因回傳，而並引發適當的事件。The contract that this interface defines allows a server control to determine whether its state should be altered as a result of the postback, and to raise the appropriate events. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET Web Form 網頁中的伺服器事件處理](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9)。For more information, see [Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Forms Pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/765bfc89-33ee-4d0d-bbe6-3b172c06def9). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作自訂文字 方塊中伺服器控制項介面。The following code example demonstrates a custom text box server control that implements the interface. 屬性會改變，回傳的結果，伺服器控制項會引發回傳資料載入之後的事件。The property is changed as a result of the postback, and the server control raises a event after postback data has been loaded. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackDataHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackDataHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackDataHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackDataHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 在 ASP.NET Web Pages 中處理的伺服器事件

span.span: Server Event Handling in ASP.NET Web Pages

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool LoadPostData(string postDataKey, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection postCollection) cil managed
Public Function LoadPostData (postDataKey As String, postCollection As NameValueCollection) As Boolean

param.name: postDataKey
param.span: 控制項的索引鍵識別項。

span.span: The key identifier for the control.

param.name: postCollection
param.span: 所有內送名稱值的集合。

span.span: The collection of all incoming name values.

summary.span: 在類別實作時，處理 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項的回傳資料。

span.span: When implemented by a class, processes postback data for an ASP.NET server control.

returns.span: 如果伺服器控制項的狀態因回傳而變更，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the server control's state changes as a result of the postback; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 網頁架構會追蹤傳回的所有伺服器控制項`true`方法呼叫，然後再叫用那些控制項上的方法。The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` to this method call, and then invokes the method on those controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作版本的伺服器控制項方法。The following code example demonstrates a server control that implements a version of the method. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackDataHandler.LoadPostData Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RaisePostDataChangedEvent() cil managed

summary.span: 當類別實作時，發出信號給伺服器控制項，使其告知 ASP.NET 應用程式，控制項的狀態已變更。

span.span: When implemented by a class, signals the server control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發任何變更的事件之伺服器控制項的實作介面。The method raises any change events for the server control that implements the interface. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作伺服器控制項方法。The following code example demonstrates how a server control can implement the method. [!code-csharp[Classic IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic IPostBackDataHandler.RaisePostDataChangedEvent Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
